title: IISc-ICASSP Fellowship Award
content: Honored to be selected as an IISc-ICASSP Fellowship Recipient for 2025. Looking forward to working on matrix estimation techniques at IISc Bangalore.

title: CSIR NET JRF Qualification
content: Successfully qualified CSIR NET JRF with All India Rank: 121. This achievement marks a significant milestone in my academic journey.

title: Research Paper in Progress
content: Currently preparing a research paper on coherence reduction techniques in sparse modeling for submission to IEEE Transactions on Signal Processing.

title: Academic Excellence Award
content: Received the Department Gold Medal for Outstanding Academic Performance and Excellence in Mathematics at RKMVERI.

title: Professional Development
content: Participated in the Teacher's Enrichment Workshop at RKMVCC, enhancing teaching and communication skills.

title: Getting Started with Machine Learning
content: An introduction to machine learning concepts and practical applications. Learn about the fundamental algorithms and tools used in modern ML projects.

title: Web Development Best Practices
content: Explore the latest web development practices and techniques for building modern, responsive websites. Tips and tricks for better performance and user experience.

title: Data Visualization with Python
content: A comprehensive guide to creating beautiful and informative data visualizations using Python libraries like Matplotlib and Seaborn.
